articles.author: Kim Bellware
articles.title: Boy Scouts of America changes name to Scouting America in rebrand - The Washington Post
articles.description: The change comes as the scouting organization tries to move past years of turmoil, including sexual abuse allegations and a public battle with the Girl Scouts.
articles.content:
After 114 years of being known as the Boy Scouts of America, the nations largest scouting organization is changing its name to the more inclusive Scouting America.
The major rebrand, announced Tuesd… [+289 chars]

articles.title: New Starbucks summer menu includes Summer-Berry Refreshers with raspberry pearls - Good Morning America
articles.description: All the new Starbucks summer menu items from Berry Refreshers to Pineapple Cloud Cake, plus in-app discounts for the loyalty rewards members.
articles.content:
Although the first official day of summer isn't for another 44 days, Starbucks announced its new summer menu on Tuesday to give coffee fans an early taste of the season.

articles.title: Biden says antisemitism has no place in America in somber speech connecting the Holocaust to Hamas’ attack on Israel - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden on Tuesday issued a call to fight a swiftly rising tide of antisemitism, saying such hate has no place in America as he connected the horrors of the Holocaust to Hamas’ attack on October 7.
